original_text: In this way they will lay up treasure for themselves as a firm foundation for the coming age, so that they may take hold of the life that is truly life.
korean_text: 이것이 장래에 자기를 위하여 좋은 터를 쌓아 참된 생명을 취하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: In this way they will lay up treasure for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 그들은 자신을 위해 보물을 쌓아둘 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as a firm foundation for the coming age
so that they may take hold of the life
